/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and buses, integral to the city's rhythm, are scattered throughout the scene, hinting at the constant movement and energy of Beijing. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting soft shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and vehicles.
